list.content: I never expected to find such a refined lady, with an elegance that made me feel somewhat shy. Upon opening the door, I was greeted by a beautiful Japanese lady. Contrary to my first impression of her elegance, she was very friendly with a charming smile. Thank you, Miss Kuroki, for such a wonderful day, I look forward to seeing her again!
My first experience, thanks to the director for booking a restaurant with a terrace to view the cherry blossoms, along with the charming Miss Asahina. Unforgettable moments with beauty and nature!
On my solo trip to Mount Fuji, I never expected to have a companion at my ryokan. Thank you to Miss Hashimoto and the director for the two-hour journey!
Finally tried my first group experience, next time I want to try with four people and play mahjong!
An unexpected night of relaxation. I met the most beautiful lady of my life, with exceptional service... I was moved by her dedication. Definitely want to see her again!
Model height! Elegance and mature charm. Her massage techniques are impeccable, nothing to criticize!

As I entered the LM from the airport, the beauty was already waiting, dressed in the OL secretary outfit and black stockings I requested. During the journey to the hotel, I couldn't help but hold her hand... it was quite an interesting trip... We ended up having a passionate moment at the hotel. Thank you to Miss Amane for the extra stockings, though I accidentally tore them.
I thought my Cosplay request was too much, but she really recreated my favorite anime character. Thank you to Miss Uehara, sorry for breaking the hair accessory, perhaps I was too enthusiastic.
This time I tried different styles: three ladies in three days, from 155cm to 175cm, each with their unique charm. Thank you to the director for the coordination!
The club with private jacuzzi was special. Thank you to the director for organizing my birthday party with 10 ladies in bikinis, it was my most memorable and exhausting birthday!
My first experience with a Japanese actress, the service was as refined as a high-end restaurant, impeccable in every detail.

Thank you to the director for organizing the yacht party in Tokyo Bay! The sea view was beautiful, Miss Mizuno's service was exceptional, and the boat's rocking added a special dimension to the experience, simply incredible!

fullProcess.desc: We accept cash in yen, USDT (at the day's rate), and other methods. USDT is recommended to minimize fees. Your booking is confirmed immediately after payment.

fullFaq.a: Standard rate: 100,000 yen/90 minutes (varies by companion level). Additional services such as transfers, private events, or hot spring access have additional costs.
Of course! We recommend starting with our basic plan of '100,000 yen/90 minutes + approximately 4,000 yen for transportation' to experience our professional service.

fullFaq.q: Can I change companions if not satisfied?
fullFaq.a: If there are obvious service issues, we can change immediately or cancel. For personal preferences, we cannot offer same-day changes or refunds. Contact our customer service for assistance.

fullFaq.q: I don't speak Japanese, how will we communicate?
fullFaq.a: Don't worry. Our customer service will coordinate everything beforehand, and we can use Google Translate or ChatGPT for real-time communication.

fullFaq.q: What payment methods do you accept?
fullFaq.a: Cash (yen), USDT (at the day's rate). We recommend USDT for its low fees and convenience.

fullFaq.q: Why do you need so much information for the first booking?
fullFaq.a: To ensure the safety and privacy of you and our companions, we need basic information (phone, hotel address) according to Japanese law.

fullFaq.q: Is full service legal in Japan?
fullFaq.a: Japanese law only permits partial services. Any additional interaction is a mutual personal decision. If you have doubts, we can explain the legal risks.
We can organize group events with advance booking, though options are limited and cost is usually 1.2 times per person. Contact us 72 hours in advance.

fullFaq.q: Why don't you accept same-day bookings?
fullFaq.a: Our companions usually have other commitments and need time to prepare. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preference.

fullFaq.q: Why don't the photos show faces?
fullFaq.a: Many of our companions have other professions, so we protect their privacy by showing only their figure and style.

fullFaq.q: Why don't I get a response on LINE?
fullFaq.a: Please send a message or emoji after adding us so we can notify and respond to you immediately.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to {brand} (hereinafter 'we'). To ensure the safety and rights of both parties, please read and comply with the following terms:

sections.title: I. Health and Hygiene
sections.content: For intimate encounters, clients must bathe and maintain oral hygiene before service, and inform about their health status; if the client has fever, respiratory infection, skin or sexual disease, or if the companion suspects these conditions, service may be terminated immediately; during service, if any contagious disease or discomfort is detected, we may cancel the service.

sections.title: II. Respect and Safety
sections.content: For intimate encounters, respect the lady and use protection; any rejection or insistence on non-consensual acts will result in immediate service termination; long nails, dry skin on hands, or other conditions that may cause discomfort must be addressed before service; violence, pulling, mistreatment, SM accessories, or special behaviors not previously agreed upon are prohibited;

sections.title: III. Privacy and Recording
sections.content: Using cameras, phones, or recording devices is strictly prohibited; requesting personal contact, meetings outside service, or attempting to hire our companions directly without authorization constitutes a serious violation;

sections.title: IV. Service Restrictions
sections.content: Prohibited for those under 18 (including high school students); intoxicated clients, under influence of illegal drugs, or considered inappropriate will be rejected; gang members, illegal groups, or disguised competitors will be rejected; any offensive, discriminatory, religious/political propaganda, or inappropriate behavior is prohibited;

sections.title: V. Cancellation Policy
sections.content: Clients must notify cancellations or changes 72 hours in advance, or a fee equivalent to one session will apply; if we must cancel due to weather, transportation, or emergencies, we will notify immediately and offer full refund or rescheduling;

sections.title: VI. Force Majeure
sections.content: In case of earthquakes, typhoons, pandemic restrictions, or traffic control, we will not be responsible and will help with alternatives or refunds;

sections.title: VII. Data Protection
sections.content: We handle your personal information according to the Data Protection Law, using it only for related services; without your written consent, we will not share data with third parties, implementing technical and administrative measures for its security;

sections.title: VIII. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Except by law, we are not responsible for unforeseeable damages or those not caused by serious negligence; if the client causes third-party claims, they will be responsible for compensation;

sections.title: IX. Rejection and Termination
sections.content: If the companion rejects any act and the client insists, it constitutes a serious violation; if the client frequently changes confirmed schedules or locations, we may adjust or terminate the service; any violation of these terms will result in termination without refund;

sections.title: X. Blacklist and Legal Responsibility
sections.content: Serious violations, fraud, or illegal acts will result in permanent prohibition; we reserve the right to report to authorities and seek compensation for damages;

sections.title: XI. Dispute Resolution
sections.content: Disputes will first be resolved through friendly negotiation; if no agreement is reached, both parties accept the jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court.

terms.effect: These terms take effect from their publication. Using our services implies that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms.
